about_the_game:
Svalbard is a highly realistic recreation of the Svalbard islands for XPlane 11. The Norwegian archipelago in the Arctic Ocean is situated about midway between continental Norway and the North Pole. The islands range from 74° to 81° northern latitude, north of the Polar Circle. This area isn‘t covered by the XPlane default scenery.

So the scenery package Svalbard not only fills this gap in the XPlane landcape but also includes all airports and heliports of this region: Svalbard lufthavn, Longyear (ENSB), Svea (ENSA), Ny Alesund (ENAS), Barentsburg (ENBA) and Pyramiden (ENPY).


  • Highly realistic recreation of the complete islands group of Svalbard with an area of about 61000km².
  • High resolution mesh with detailed coast lines and shapes of glaciers
  • Customized local terrain details where reasonable, a.e. in the surrounding of the airports
  • High detail models of all airport buildings and installations with customized objects
  • photo realistic generic ground textures
  • Winter season included
  • Realistic night time effects
  • Compatible with World Traffic 3
  • Customized paintings of local airlines for several X-Plane aircraft

The islands range from 74° to 81° northern latitude, north of the Polar Circle. This area isn‘t covered by the XPlane default scenery.

So the scenery package Svalbard not only fills this gap in the XPlane landcape but also includes all airports and heliports of this region: Svalbard lufthavn, Longyear (ENSB), Svea (ENSA), Ny Alesund (ENAS), Barentsburg (ENBA) and Pyramiden (ENPY).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Dual Core i3, i5, i7 with at least 3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core i3, i5, i7 with at least 3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

The Norwegian archipelago in the Arctic Ocean is situated about midway between continental Norway and the North Pole. The islands range from 74° to 81° northern latitude, north of the Polar Circle. This area isn‘t covered by the XPlane default scenery.
